show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
Talk Takes Center Stage at Leid Stories’ “Family Reunion” It’s a family reunion on Leid Stories!  We’re together again! <!--more--> We’ve had a too-long dry spell, unable to connect with each other and talk about the issues of the day.
Well,  the tech and wiring wizards have done their thing, and we’re good to go while PRN prepares to move into its new home.
 This, of course, means we have some making up to do for all those “Free Your Mind Fridays” that went poof.
Well, it starts today.
Share the joy of reconnecting with the Leid Stories family.
Pick up the phone and pick up from where you left off.
Call 888-874-4888 and give us a piece of your mind.
